page.title: 08Two Cafes-Dorking NE
page.content: Near{Box Hill}there are two cafes. One is Rykas at the bottom of the hill near the dual-carriageway on the London Road. It serves{motor-cyclists, {lorry drivers and coach parties}during the week and walkers and cyclists at the weekend. Eight people work there and the most popular food is a{burger. Cindy Richards who owns Rykas was not very talkative. At the top of the hill near the look-out point is the Zig Zag cafe-Restaurant. Many{old people}come to the cafe on drives or Old Folks outing. They enjoy{tea,coffee and {biscuits and ice-creams}. Sometimes Famous people come when T.V. advertisements are made. Different clubs often use the restaurant section. The{busiest time for both} {cafes is in summer and at weekends. Matthew,the owner,gave us ice-creams.
